name: portfolio
description: The 'portfolio' back-end API, version 1.0.0, authored by Amine Chairi, is a robust and flexible server-side application designed to support and enhance various functionalities related to a portfolio or personal website. This API serves as the backbone for managing and retrieving data associated with your portfolio, making it a crucial component for dynamic and data-driven web experiences.
author: Amine Chairi
